block.p: A memorial tribute to the drama and literary critic Richard Gilman will take place on Monday at 1 p.m. at Symphony Space, 2537 Broadway at 95th Street, in Manhattan. Mr. Gilman died on Oct. 28 at age 83.
A memorial tribute to the drama and literary critic Richard Gilman will take place on Monday at 1 p.m. at Symphony Space.

A memorial tribute to the drama and literary critic Richard Gilman will take place on Monday at 1 p.m. at Symphony Space, 2537 Broadway at 95th Street, in Manhattan. Mr. Gilman died on Oct. 28 at age 83.

Among those expected to speak at the event, which is open to the public, are the actor and comedian David Alan Grier, the writer Mary Gordon, the director and actor Andre Gregory and the critics Stanley Kauffmann and Gordon Rogoff.
